fn.p: Funding. This study was supported by The Scientific Research Projects for Higher Education in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region (Grant No. NJZZ21027); Support Plan for the Innovation and Entrepreneurship Initiation Plan for Overseas Students in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region (Grant No. MOHRSS2020122); and Doctoral Start-up Fund of the Affiliated Hospital of Inner Mongolia University for the Nationalities (Grant No. MDFY2020001).
